titleStmt.title: A case of great and present use whether we may lawfully hear the now conforming ministers who are re-ordained and have renounced the Covenant and some of them supposed to be scandalous in their lives considered and affirmatively resolved / by a late eminent Congregational divine.
titleStmt.author: Nye, Philip, 1596?-1672.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
